name: flowscriipt
description: Flowscriipt is a platform that allows you to easily create JavaScript components that can be imported into your projects via a CDN. With Flowscriipt, you can save time and effort by creating powerful components without the need for extensive coding knowledge. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, Flowscriipt makes it easy to create professional-grade components that can be easily integrated into your projects.
